title.ph: How to Submit an Adoption Inquiry

task.shortdesc: Start Cerberus's adoption process by applying through Adopt-a-Pet using the official application link. If you cannot access the platform, you may email the foster team with the same information.

step.info: Review Cerberus’s full biography, behavior notes, and care needs to ensure compatibility before applying.
Complete the application at Adopt-a-Pet: Cerberus’s Adoption Application . This is the fastest and preferred way to start the process. The current adoption fee is $100.

step.cmd: If You Cannot Apply Online, Send an Email Instead
step.info:
If you are unable to access Adopt-a-Pet, email the foster team at christinaemayr@gmail.com with the following information:
Your full name and location (city, state)
A brief introduction about yourself and household members (including other pets)
Why you feel Cerberus would be a good fit for your home
Housing situation
Any relevant experience with dogs or high-energy breeds Include photos of your home or yard if possible. This helps the team assess suitability.
A foster coordinator or volunteer will follow up within 2–3 business days. They may ask clarifying questions or suggest next steps (screening call, home check, or meet-and-greet).

ul.li: Be honest and specific. The goal isn’t to “pass,” but to find the right match.
Don’t worry if your setup isn’t perfect. Many issues can be supported with guidance.
If you’re unsure about adopting but want to learn more, say so in your message.

postreq.p: You can reuse or adapt this text for adoption listings or email templates. It helps standardize applications, reduce back-and-forth, and makes it easier to assess fit before proceeding.
